name: Young Emerald Dragon
senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 18

traits.name: Interference Aura
traits.desc: Enemies within 30 feet must make a DC 14 Intelligence saving throw every round to maintain spells that require concentration.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
